content: this is a free fan-made amigurumi pattern to make your very own little mew-inspired doll the finished amigurumi should measure approximately 8 5 inches tall the specific yarn colors seen in the photos are red heart super saver in petal pink for normal mew and light blue for shiny mew you will want to use a 4 0mm hook or smaller eyes are made from felt in white and blue there is an 18 gauge stem wire in the tail for support
